mapper.select: SELECT con.*,sta.valueName AS conTypeName,sta.valueName AS billstatusName,op.oName AS billConfirmerName FROM `consumptionRecord` AS con,`datastatus` AS sta,`datastatus` AS stb,`operator` AS op WHERE con.conType = sta.valueId AND con.billstatus = stb.valueId AND sta.typeCode = 'CONSUMPTION_TYPE' AND stb.typeCode = 'BILL_STATUS' AND con.billConfirmer = op.oId AND con.roomNumber = #{roomNumber}
